name: Input Assembler
description: Collects and processes raw data from various sources (e.g., website crawls, analytics, market trends) into a standardized format for AI processing.

name: Context Pack
description: Enriches assembled data with relevant contextual information, such as industry benchmarks, competitor analysis, and historical performance, for deeper AI insights.

name: Audit Modules
description: A suite of specialized AI models (e.g., AI Visibility, Brand Trust, Semantic Structure) that analyze the Context Pack to generate specific SEO and brand intelligence scores and insights.

name: Output Surfaces
description: Presents AI-generated scores, insights, issues, and recommendations through various user interfaces, including interactive dashboards and detailed reports.
